title: Sound On: Optional Masks, Fake 'Crack Pipe' Panic
itunes:title: Sound On: Optional Masks, Fake 'Crack Pipe' Panic
description:
Guests: Chair of the Congressional Ukraine Caucus, Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur of Ohio, Dr. Katrine Wallace, epidemiologist and adjunct assistant professor at the University of Illinois Chicago School of Public Health and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
